speaker: DUKE OF YORK
text_entry: SCENE IV. A camp in Wales.

speaker: DUKE OF YORK
text_entry: Enter EARL OF SALISBURY and a Welsh Captain

speaker: Captain
text_entry: My lord of Salisbury, we have stay'd ten days,

speaker: Captain
text_entry: And hardly kept our countrymen together,

speaker: Captain
text_entry: And yet we hear no tidings from the king;

speaker: Captain
text_entry: Therefore we will disperse ourselves: farewell.

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Stay yet another day, thou trusty Welshman:

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: The king reposeth all his confidence in thee.

speaker: Captain
text_entry: 'Tis thought the king is dead; we will not stay.

speaker: Captain
text_entry: The bay-trees in our country are all wither'd

speaker: Captain
text_entry: And meteors fright the fixed stars of heaven;

speaker: Captain
text_entry: The pale-faced moon looks bloody on the earth

speaker: Captain
text_entry: And lean-look'd prophets whisper fearful change;

speaker: Captain
text_entry: Rich men look sad and ruffians dance and leap,

speaker: Captain
text_entry: The one in fear to lose what they enjoy,

speaker: Captain
text_entry: The other to enjoy by rage and war:

speaker: Captain
text_entry: These signs forerun the death or fall of kings.

speaker: Captain
text_entry: Farewell: our countrymen are gone and fled,

speaker: Captain
text_entry: As well assured Richard their king is dead.

speaker: Captain
text_entry: Exit

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Ah, Richard, with the eyes of heavy mind

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: I see thy glory like a shooting star

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Fall to the base earth from the firmament.

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Thy sun sets weeping in the lowly west,

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Witnessing storms to come, woe and unrest:

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Thy friends are fled to wait upon thy foes,

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: And crossly to thy good all fortune goes.

speaker: EARL OF SALISBURY
text_entry: Exit
